title: RadioShack May File For Bankruptcy
teaser: RadioShack says it may file for bankruptcy without outside intervention or be forced to liquidate.
contentencoded:
RadioShack revealed in a regulatory filing Thursday, that it would have to file for bankruptcy without intervention or else liquidate.

Here & Now’s Sacha Pfeiffer speaks to Bloomberg’s Michael Regan about the scenarios for RadioShack, and how the company came to this crossroads.

Guest

  • Michael Regan, editor-at-large at Bloomberg News. He tweets @Reganonymous.
